map.string: Logging level: 0 - Debug, 1 - Info, 2 - Warn, 3 - None
If enabled, GL textures will be removed from memory immediately when its fetched texture is removed. This might result in textures behind you being unloaded.
Threshold, at what texture memory load level GL textures will be removed from memory if FSDestroyGLTexturesImmediately is set to TRUE.
Run SL in a fullscreen window
Disable the push the simulator applies when camera collides with objects
Reset the camera when clicking your avatar. Also called Mouse Steering.
Allow use of " : " instead of /me for IRC-style emotes
Opens the IM floater and announces an incoming IM as soon as somebody is starting to write an IM to you.
Replace empty object names with "(Unnamed)" to prevent spoofing. Undesired for immersion.
Disables shouting with the Control(CTRL) + Enter key combinaison.
Disables whispering with the Shift + Enter key combinaison.
Show typing status above avatar's head when bubble chat is off
Add seconds to timestamp in chat history floater
Override the friend color when user has a PVData-provided color.
Amount of time in minutes between PVData refreshes
Always keep a media plugin thread to speed up loading.
Disables VRAM detection via WMI probing on Windows systems
Do not limit Intel graphics RAM. Detection is usually wrong, so we cap it to 512MB.
Overrides the video memory detection on Windows if a value greater 0 is passed (in case DirectX memory detection fails or is wrong)
Output missing assets messages to INFO instead of DEBUG
Output PVDebug to console (Only for developers)
-1 = Don't force, 0 = DEBUG, 1 = INFO, 2 = WARN, 3 = ERROR, 4 = NONE
Do not allocate all VRAM and leave 25% or 3GB (first occurrence) for other programs
Invert pitch axis in all joystick modes.
Input multiplier for the space navigator and other devices
INTERNAL | this is used to determine if the user is using a special beam color
Control whether new scripts in inventory are mono(true) or lsl(false)
Fly by holding jump key (FALSE = fly by using "Fly" command only) Replaces Linden AutomaticFly setting.
Land by holding crouch key or using "Fly" command (FALSE = land by using "Fly" command only) Replaces Linden AutomaticFly setting.
Do not force standing up after resetting your animations.
Do not force standing up when entering appearance mode.
Short-circuit the pre-jump and land animations to be more "nimble". May be seen as cheating in some Role-Play environments.
Reset the camera when moving the avatar. Disable for more camera freedom.
Rotate your avatar away from the camera when clicking yourself.
Do not rotate your avatar away from the camera when clicking yourself.
Use animation timesteps. Might be buggy.
If true, disconnect from neighboring regions and all further neighbors on teleport
Bias value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Error scale for shadow bias (based on altitude).
Number of samples to take for each pass of shadow blur (value range 1-16). Actual number of samples is value * 2 - 1.
Near clip plane split distances for shadow map frusta.
Cutoff error value to use ortho instead of perspective projection.
Cutoff FOV to use ortho instead of perspective projection.
Gaussian coefficients for the two shadow/SSAO blurring passes (z component unused).
Near clip plane of shadow camera (affects precision of depth shadows).
Magnitude of noise on shadow samples.
Offset value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Error scale for shadow offset (based on altitude).
Near clip plane split distances for orthographic shadow map frusta.
Raw shadow width and height of each of the four shadow maps, closest (X), mid (Y), far (Z) furthest. (W)
Near clip plane split distances for shadow map frusta (x=perspective, y=ortho, z=transition rate).
Multiplier for value for areas which are totally occluded. Blends with original color for partly-occluded areas. (Third component is unused.)
Occlusion sensitivity factor for ambient occlusion (larger is more)
Scaling factor for the area to sample for occluders (pixels at 1 meter away, inversely varying with distance)
Disable editing arm motion and beam if true
Do not broadcast own LookAt data to other users.
Hide own LookAt data when LookAt rendering is enabled
Render a line from LookAt beacon to the originating avatar
Render name of originating avatar under LookAt beacon
If true, avatar LookAt beacons will be displayed
If enabled, temporary derendered objects will stay derendered until teleport. If disabled, they stay derendered until the end of the session or get manually re-rendered via asset blacklist floater.
Set the strength of chromatic aberration.
Color grading technique to use. 0 applies linear color correction, 1 applies a 1D color gammut LUT, 2 does nothing (yet), -1 disables color grading altogether. Defaults to linear.
Image to use for color grading post process. Note: this should always be a gradient with alpha. (UUID texture reference)
10 to 15 - default medium dither 20 to 29 - less dither, more expensive - 39 no dither, very expensive
Use pass 2 in alpha rendering when depth of field is enabled.
Allow more than 16 channels for texture index. Can expose driver bugs.
Target FPS for the Frame Limiter
Add a filmic grain to the depth of field shader
This enables and disables Lens Flare effects from the sun.
false: Normal shiny | true: Screen Space Reflections
This enables and disables Tone Mapping.
High Dynamic Range Exposure. Each value represents a different color channel.
Force avatar attachments to be rendered at their maximum level of detail.
Force avatar attachments to be rendered at their minimum level of detail.
High Dynamic Range Gamma Correction. Each value represents a different color channel.
Fade out volumetric lighting if we don't face the sun.
Bigger number causes the God Rays to start fading sooner
God Rays resolution (values above 128 are usually useless)
High Dynamic Range Brightness Offset. Each value represents a different color channel. Higher values brighten the scene, lower values darken.
Keep graphical preferences when GPU changes
How many iterations of Gaussian blur to perform on the last_snapshot
Set the percentual amount of greyscale's strength, 1.0 means fully greyscale , 0.0 means fully colored
Set the number of color shades used for rendering the scene.
Set the percentual amount of sepia's strength, 1.0 means a full sepia tone, 0.0 means no sepia tone at all.
Raw projector shadow width (X) and height (Y) by multiplicator (Z)
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
Render shadows from and on alpha objects
0 = No shadows. 1 = No rigged shadows. 2 = No rigged shadows but always render system avatar. 3 = Full detail, but slow.
Resolution of the reflection while in SSR mode
Advanced tone mapping options. X = Shoulder strength, Y = Linear strength, Z = Linear angle.
Advanced tone mapping options (cont'd). X = Toe strength, Y = Toe numerator, Z = Toe denominator.
Advanced tone mapping options (cont'd). X = Linear white point, Y = Exposure bias.
Tone mapping technique to use. 0 applies Filmic, 1 applies Linear, and 2 applies Reinhard. Defaults to Reinhard.
Amount of vignette to apply (X), power of vignette shading (Y), and multiplier for vignette shading (Z).
Chose which type of Vertical Sync to use 0 - disabled, 1 = normal, 2 = adaptive
Makes agent effects use their PVData Color.
Shows the parcel boundary up to the maximum build height instead of just 0.66m above ground
Allows the agent to rez objects under the target locations land group. Must be a member of the DEEDED land group.
Stores the column visibility for the area search
Display names in format specified. 0 = Respect user preferences 1 = Display Name (Bobâ™¥Smith) 2 = Legacy Name (bobsmith Resident) 3 = Account Name (bobsmith) 4 = Everything (User fi + account Name)
Add seconds to status bar clock
Cap the amount of outfits displayed in the Appearance floater. This helps performance for accounts containing a gigantic amount of outfits (more than 100). Set to 0 to disable.
Show group title in avatar hover tip
Last selected tab in appearance floater
Log snapshots to disk in local chat
Debug option to open the Machinima Sidebar
Show count of users in region on world map
Hides the marketplace inbox panel entirely and shows folder in inventory instead
Render a red line in the center of the camera view frustrum
Use the world map tile as the minimap background
If enabled, the avatar complexity will be shown in the nametag for every avatar.
If enabled, the avatar complexity will be shown for other avatars
If enabled, the avatar complexity for the own avatar will be shown in the nametag.
Show prefix text for complexity. If false, only shows number.
Show short prefix text for complexity. If false, show long one.
If enabled, the avatar complexity will be shown for not too complex avatars (Jelly Dolls) as well
How long to wait before showing a new progress tip
Show the current balance in snapshots if enabled
Show the current balance in the statusbar if enabled
Shows a notice if the simulator version is different after a region crossing or teleport.
Show the current frames per second count in the statusbar
Character to use to separate search keywords. Defaults to space
Clicking on traffic indicator (upper right) toggles Statistics window, not the Lag Meter window
Determines the behavior of the voice chat indicator. 0 = LL default behavior; 1 = completely disable indicator; 2 = show dot only; 3 = show waves only
How long the transition should last
Choose whether to always use the region's environment settings when they are availabe or to allow the manual selections to remain unchanging.
Allow all land for Phoenix WL sharing
Whitelist friend's land for Phoenix WL sharing
Whitelist group land on groups you are member of for Phoenix WL sharing
Enables auto setting WL from parcel desc flags
Blank out the viewer's window title.
Force short username in window title
Show user name in the the viewer's window title.
Show version number in the viewer's window title.
Distance of shadow far clip plane from camera (meters)
Check if the user opened the debug settings on this install.
Check if the user opened the debug settings on this install.
Disables restrictions imposed by RLV when at least one HUD is locked (Wireframe, hiding HUDs, etc).
Show received @version queries sent in IM as-is
Inform user when replying to received @version queries
